We as 6038-ITOBOT,decided to print smth type of support and holder our elevator system. Here our printed objects that you can inspect them;

accounts.google.com

Google Drive: Sign-in

Access Google Drive with a Google account (for personal use) or Google Workspace account (for business use).

Sokoloff","username":"sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-18T15:10:57.839Z","cooked":"

Welcome to CD!

Pics look great. If you’re able (and your team is willing) to share the CAD files, that is something that is commonly done (though not required nor universally done) and is further helpful to other teams who might want to replicate or improve upon 6038’s efforts here.

Sure,we glad to share the parts that we developed.
Also our print settings;
0.4m nozzle and 0.20mm print with %40 infill

here the link: gövde.STL - Google Drive

For durability test,we test them in pressure test and damage testing with outting them to our old robots and they have succees. Also we printed PLA in different infill percentages to find the best one.
